name: WhatsTheBigIdea.com
tag_list: wordpress, drupal, joomla, website-design, development, brochures, graphic-design
overview:
Web development and graphic design services company in Hudson Valley, New York.

Providing complete design, programming and marketing for business. Specializing in WordPress, Drupal, Joomla and Magento open source frameworks. As well as custom Web applications for a diverse variety of purposes.

Graphic design offering include brochures, booklets, posters, sell sheets, book covers and jackets, newspapers, magazine ads, postcards, banners, stationary, business cards and logos.

Marketing services offered: social networking, facebook, twitter, linkedin and local search marketing. Search engine marketing an website code refinements.
